body_html:
@pjh5,
Will do.
I have a laptop with no gpu....ideal for trying this out

Update==================
Python 3.6.5
conda install -c caffe2 pytorch-caffe2 results in

Unsatisfiable error: Following specifications were found to be in conflict:

  • python 3.6*
  • pytorch-caffe2 ->python >= 2.7, <=2.8.0a0

Any suggestions?
